{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20696v1", "title": "Simultaneous IM/DD Data Transmission and High-Rate Secret Key
  Distribution over a Single C-band Channel", "summary": "We demonstrate hierarchical multiscale PAM-4 transmission combining 500 Mbps
data transfer with optical-layer cryptographic key distribution at rates 24.14
Mbps and 8.38 Mbps secure against passive eavesdropper advantage 0 dB and 6 dB
respectively.", "main_category": "physics.optics", "categories": "physics.optics", "published": "2025-04-29T12:21:23Z"}
